v: and I will watch carefully to see what he will say to me
and how I should turn from my complaint.

v.v: For the vision is yet for a future time and will finally speak and not fail.
Look! The one whose desires are not right within him is puffed up. But the righteous will live by his faith.

v: “Record this vision, and write plainly on the tablets so that the one reading them might run.
Though it delays, wait for it. For it will surely come and will not tarry.

v.v: For wine is a betrayer of the arrogant young man so that he will not abide,
Will not all these create a saying to ridicule him and a taunting song about him, saying,
Will the ones biting at you not rise up suddenly, and the ones terrifying you awaken?
Because you have plundered many peoples, all the remnant of the peoples will plunder you.
‘Woe to the one who carves out evil gains for his house,
You have devised shame for your house by cutting off many people, and have sinned against yourself.
For the stones will cry out from the wall, and the rafters of timber will answer them,
‘Woe to the one who builds a city with blood, and who establishes a town in iniquity.’
Is it not from Yahweh of hosts
Yet the land will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of Yahweh as the waters cover the sea.
‘Woe to the one who forces his neighbors to drink—
You will be filled with shame instead of glory.
The violence done to Lebanon will overwhelm you and the destruction of animals will terrify you.
What does the carved figure profit you? For the one who has carved it, or who casts a figure from molten metal, is a teacher of lies;
‘Woe to the one saying to the wood, Wake up! Or to the silent stone, Arise!’ Do these things teach?
But Yahweh is in his holy temple! Be silent before him, all the land.”

v: but enlarges his desire like the grave and, like death, is never satisfied.
He gathers to himself every nation and gathers up for himself all of the peoples.
‘Woe to the one increasing what is not his! For how long will you increase the weight of the pledges you have taken?’
You will become a victim for them.
For you have shed human blood and acted with violence against the land, the cities, and all who live in them.
so he can set his nest on high to keep himself safe from the hand of evil.’
that peoples labor for fire and all the other nations weary themselves for nothing?
in order to look at their nakedness.’
Now it is your turn! Drink, and you will expose your uncircumcised foreskin!
The cup in Yahweh’s right hand is coming around to you,
and disgrace will cover your glory.
For you have shed human blood and you have acted with violence against the land, the cities, and all who live in them.
for he trusts his own handiwork when he makes these mute gods.
See, it is overlaid with gold and silver, but there is no breath at all within it.
